author: Ned Stark
quote: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

author: Jaime Lannister
quote: The things I do for love.

author: Tyrion
quote: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

author: Cersei
quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.

author: Ned Stark
quote: I grew up with soldiers.I learned how to die a long time ago.

author: Tyrion
quote: Never forget what you are.The rest of the world will not.Wear it like armour, and it can never be used to hurt you.

author: Joffrey
quote: Everyone is mine to torment.

author: Tyrion
quote: The day will come when you think you are safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.

author: Melisandre
quote: The night is dark and full of terrors.

author: Ygritte
quote: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

author: Various members of the Night's Watch
quote: Night gathers, and now my watch begins

author: Various Lannisters
quote: A Lannister always pays his debts.

author: Aerys II Targaryen
quote: Burn them all!

author: Syrio Forel
quote: What do we say to the God of death?

author: Bronn
quote: There's no cure for being a c*nt.

author: Brynden Tully
quote: I've seen wet shits I like better than Walder Frey.

author: Pretty much everyone
quote: Winter is coming

author: Tyrion
quote: That's what I do: I drink and I know things.

author: Daenerys
quote: I am the dragon's daughter, and I swear to you that those who would harm you will die screaming.

author: Tywin
quote: A lion does not concern himself with the opinion of sheep.

author: Littlefinger
quote: Chaos isn't a pit.Chaos is a ladder.

author: Varys
quote: Power resides where men believe it resides.It's a trick; a shadow on the wall.

author: The Hound
quote: I understand that if any more words come pouring out your c*nt mouth, I'm gonna have to eat every f*cking chicken in this room.

author: Ramsay
quote: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven't been paying attention.

author: Tywin
quote: I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

author: Cersei
quote: If you ever call me sister again, I'll have you strangled in your sleep.

author: Arya
quote: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell.And I'm going home.

author: Tywin
quote: Any man who must say 'I am the King' is no true King.

author: Tyrion
quote: Oh, monster? Perhaps you should speak to me more softly then.Monsters are dangerous and just now Kings are dying like flies.

author: Jaime
quote: Jaime...my name's Jaime.

author: Tyrion
quote: I am your son.I have always been your son.

author: Samwell Tarly
quote: I read it in a book.

author: Jon Snow
quote: If I fall, don't bring me back.

author: Varys
quote: The big fish eat the little fish and I keep on paddling.

author: Daenerys
quote: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell...they're all just spokes on a wheel.This one's on top, then that one's on top, and on and on it spins, crushing those on the ground.

author: Wylis/Hodor
quote: Hold the door!

author: Lyanna Mormont
quote: I don't plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me.

author: Arya
quote: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers.Tell them winter came for House Frey.

author: Lady Olenna
quote: He really was a c*nt, wasn't he?

author: Davos Seaworth
quote: Nothing f*cks you harder than time.

author: Jon Snow
quote: There is only one war that matters.The Great War.And it is here.

author: Cersei Lannister
quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: It’s not easy being drunk all the time.If it were easy, everyone would do it.

author: Daenerys Targaryen
quote: I will do what queens do, I will rule.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: Let me tell you something, Bastard.Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not.Wear it like armor and it can never be used to hurt you.

author: The Night’s Watch oath
quote: Night gathers, and now my watch begins.It shall not end until my death.I shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children.I shall wear no crowns and win no glory.I shall live and die at my post.I am the sword in the darkness.I am the watcher on the walls.I am the shield that guards the realms of men.I pledge my life and honor to the Night’s Watch, for this night and all the nights to come.

author: Lord Varys
quote: Power resides where men believe it resides.It’s a trick, a shadow on the wall.And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.

author: Ned Stark
quote: Winter is coming.

author: Oberyn Martell
quote: Bastards are born of passion, aren’t they? We don’t despise them in Dorne.

author: Ygritte
quote: You’re mine.Mine, as I’m yours.And if we die, we die.All men must die, Jon Snow.But first we’ll live.

author: Daenerys Targaryen
quote: I will take what is mine, with fire and blood!

author: Tywin Lannister
quote: A lion doesn’t concern itself with the opinion of sheep.

author: Lady Brienne of Tarth
quote: All my life men like you have sneered at me.And all my life I’ve been knocking men like you into the dust.

author: Lord Varys
quote: In a room sit three great men, a king, a priest, and a rich man.Between them stands a common sellsword.Each great man bids the sellsword slay the other two.Who lives, who dies? Power resides where men believe it resides.It’s a trick, a shadow on the wall, and a very small man can cast a very large shadow.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: I will hurt you for this.A day will come when you think you are safe and happy, and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.And you will know the debt is paid.

author: Tywin Lannister
quote: You’re no son of mine.

author: Arya Stark
quote: Nothing isn’t better or worse than anything.Nothing is just nothing.

author: Daenerys Targaryen
quote: A dragon is not a slave.

author: Joer Mormont
quote: The thing we love destroy us every time, lad.Remember that.

author: Sandor ‘The Hound’ Clegane
quote: Hate’s as good a thing as any to keep a person going.Better than most.

author: Petyr Baelish
quote: What we don’t know is what usually gets us killed.

author: Lord Varys
quote: A very small man can cast a very large shadow.

author: Petyr Baelish
quote: Chaos isn’t a pit, chaos is a ladder.Only the ladder is real.The climb is all there is.

author: Ser Jorah Mormont
quote: There is a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand.

author: Daenerys Targaryen
quote: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki.I am the wife of the great Kahl and I carry his son inside me.The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

author: Petyr “Littlefinger” Baelish
quote: Money buys a man’s silence for a time.A bolt in the heart buys it forever.

author: Cersei Lannister
quote: The more people you love, the weaker you are.

author: Syrio Forel
quote: There is only one God and his name is Death.And there is only one thing we say to Death: “not today”.

author: Daenerys Targaryen
quote: All men must die, but we are not men.

author: Cersei Lannister
quote: The gods have no mercy, that’s why they’re gods.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: When you tear out a man’s tongue, you are not providing him a liar, you’re only telling the world that you fear what he might say.

author: Ned Stark
quote: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

author: Arya Stark
quote: All halls lead somewhere.Where there is a way in, there is a way out.Fear cuts deeper than swords.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: My mind is my weapon.My brother has his sword, King Robert has his warhammer and I have my mind…and a mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone if it is to keep its edge.That’s why I read so much.

author: Ned Stark
quote: Some old wounds never truly heal, and bleed again at the slightest word.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: Never forget what you are, for surely the world will not.Make it your strength.Then it can never be your weakness.Armour yourself in it, and it will never be used to hurt you.

author: Jaime Lannister
quote: The things I do for love.

author: Ygritte
quote: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities.

author: Jojen Reed
quote: A reader lives a thousand live before he dies.The man who doesn’t read lives only one.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: I’m a monster, as well as a dwarf.You should charge me double.

author: Oberyn Martell
quote: It is a big and beautiful world.Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it.I don’t want to be most of us.

author: Orell
quote: People work together when it suits them.They’re loyal when it suits them.They love each other when it suits them, and they kill each other when it suits them

author: Cersei Lannister
quote: If you ever call me sister again, I’ll have you strangled in your sleep.

author: Alliser Thorne
quote: For the watch.

author: Cersei Lannister
quote: Tears aren’t a woman’s weapon.The best one is between your legs.

author: Ramsay Bolton
quote: My mother taught me not to throw stones at cripples… but father taught me: aim for their head!

author: Jaime Lannister
quote: We don’t get to choose whom we love.

author: Davos Seaworth
quote: I think mothers and father made up the gods because they wanted their children to sleep through the night.

author: Jeor Mormont
quote: When dead men and worse come hunting… You think it matters who sits on the iron throne?

author: Ned Stark
quote: I learned how to die a long time ago.

author: Ramsay Bolton
quote: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven’t been paying attention.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: The mad king did as he liked.Has your Uncle Jaime ever told you what happened to him?

author: Tywin Lannister
quote: It’s the family name that lives on.It’s all that lives on.

author: Arya Stark
quote: Stick ’em with the pointy end.

author: Sansa Stark
quote: I’m Sansa Stark of Winterfell.This is my home.And you can’t frighten me.

author: Oberyn Martell
quote: This is not the day I die.

author: Jaqen H’ghar
quote: A girl gives a man his own name?

author: Oberyn Martell
quote: It is rare to meet a Lannister who shares my enthusiasm for dead Lannisters.

author: Daenerys
quote: Turn us away, and we will burn you first.

author: Petyr “Littlefinger” Baelish
quote: My sweet, silly wife.I have only loved one woman, only one, in my entire life.Your sister.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: Drinking and lust, no man can match me in these things.I am the god of tits and wine.

author: Olenna Tyrell
quote: The world is overflowing with horrible things, but they’re all tray of cakes next to death.

author: Littlefinger
quote: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects.Always keep your foes confused.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that’s how they became powerful in the first place.

author: Roose Bolton
quote: The Lannisters send their regards.

author: Davos Seaworth
quote: If they’re half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: Please don’t eat the help!

author: Septa Unella
quote: SHAME! SHAME! SHAME!

author: Jon Snow
quote: Some men want whores on the eve of battle, and some want gods.

author: Lyanna Mormont
quote: House Mormont remembers.The North remembers.We know no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark.I don’t care if he’s a bastard.Ned Stark’s blood runs through his veins.He’s my king from this day until his last day.

author: Jon Snow
quote: The White Walkers don’t care if a man’s free folk or crow.We’re all the same to them, meat for their army.But together we can beat them.

author: Lady Stark
quote: I prayed to the Gods ‘take him away, make him die.’

author: Sansa Stark
quote: When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies but the pack survives.

author: Samwell Tarly
quote: He always come back!

author: Sansa Stark
quote: You’re going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton.Sleep well.

author: Tyrion Lannister
quote: Are you afraid? Good.You’re in the great game now.And the great game’s terrifying.The only people who aren’t afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

author: Brienn of Tarth
quote: The good lords are dead, and the rest are monsters.
